definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

sentences.english: His coach Sun Haiping said he was worried about the great pressure on Liu Xiang at this time.
sentences.chinese: 教练孙海平对刘翔此次所承受的压力表示担心。

sentences.english: What do you plan to do after you finish this study program?
sentences.chinese: 此次学习结束后你有何打算或计划？

sentences.english: We teed off the meeting with the chairman's speech.
sentences.chinese: 我们以主席的讲话开始了此次会议。

sentences.english: Both his parents fought in it.
sentences.chinese: 他的双亲都参与了此次战斗。

sentences.english: The telephone poll's margin of error is plus or minus 4%.
sentences.chinese: 此次电话民调的误差幅度约为正负4%。

sentences.english: This time, two primitive ape-like creatures, believed to be a mother and her young son.
sentences.chinese: 此次发现的两个类人猿是一位母亲和他年青的儿子。

sentences.english: The incident took place at one of Beijing's most well-known shopping areas.
sentences.chinese: 此次事故发生在北京一个最著名的商业区。

sentences.english: The experiments were conducted in an ultra-high vacuum at the low temperature of 10 Kelvin, with the use of liquid helium.
sentences.chinese: 此次实验是在10开尔文低温的超真空环境中完成的。

sentences.english: But the events have not caught the team unprepared.
sentences.chinese: 不过此次事件并没有超出过渡小组的预期。

sentences.english: This protest will not affect the summit and its outcome.
sentences.chinese: 此次抗议活动将不会左右峰会本身及其结果。

sentences.english: They are African-and-American kids, and their coming to D.C.
sentences.chinese: 他们都是非裔美籍的孩子，此次来环境保护署总部。

sentences.english: Terms of the sale were not disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 此次收购的具体条款尚未公布。

sentences.english: Representatives of the Air Force and Army observed the tests.
sentences.chinese: 来自美国空军和陆军的代表观察了此次试验。

sentences.english: This should be the current policy was due inwardness.
sentences.chinese: 这应该是此次政策出台的应有深意。

sentences.english: The hen broods 10 eggs this time.
And the implication of flowers and paintings will be unparalleledly illustrated in some of her special design.
sentences.chinese: 此次以独特设计体现花意与画意的另类表达。

definition: near in time/in the near future/very soon/recent
in the past few days/recently/in the last few days
the other day/a few days ago
